title: Servers
body: Sort your shit out league. Can't connect to your servers but my friends can. Just want to play a quick Aram thanks.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=llDeathnotell,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hf9rE0JK,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-05T11:09:44.407+0000)
>
> Sort your shit out league. Can&#039;t connect to your servers but my friends can. Just want to play a quick Aram thanks.

I cant login at all either. I have friends who are currently logged in but i keep going through 3 login attempts and then the contact notice, by the way none of those links even work, so even that is feeling kind of time wasting and useless
